titleStmt.title: A letter writ by the Lord Bishop of Salisbury, to the Lord Bishop of Cov. and Litchfield, concerning a book lately published, called, A specimen of some errors and defects in the History of the reformation of the Church of England, by Anthony Harmer
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
